mapper.sql: ID, BUS_NUM, AGENT_ID, AGENT_NAME, PARENT_BUS_NUM, PARENT_AGENT_ID, PROFIT_DATE, IN_TRANS_AMT, OUT_TRANS_AMT, PROFIT_AMT, BUS_CODE, IN_PROFIT_SCALE, OUT_PROFIT_SCALE, IN_PROFIT_AMT, OUT_PROFIT_AMT, POS_CREDIT_AMT, IPOS_CREDIT_AMT, POS_REWARD_AMT, PAY_COMPANY, NOTAX_AMT, SUPPLY_AMT, TRANS_FEE, UNICODE, SOURCE_INFO, AGENT_TYPE, UNLINE_AMT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TRANS_PROFIT_DETAIL
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from TRANS_PROFIT_DETAIL WHERE SOURCE_INFO='MPOS' and PROFIT_DATE = #{profitDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY AGENT_ID

SELECT AGENT_ID,PARENT_AGENT_ID, PROFIT_DATE,SUM(IN_TRANS_AMT)IN_TRANS_AMT, SUM(OUT_TRANS_AMT)OUT_TRANS_AMT,SUM(IN_PROFIT_SCALE)IN_PROFIT_SCALE, SUM(OUT_PROFIT_SCALE)OUT_PROFIT_SCALE, SUM(IN_PROFIT_AMT)IN_PROFIT_AMT, SUM(OUT_PROFIT_AMT)OUT_PROFIT_AMT, SUM(SUPPLY_AMT)SUPPLY_AMT, MAX(PAY_COMPANY) PAY_COMPANY, MAX(AGENT_NAME) AGENT_NAME FROM TRANS_PROFIT_DETAIL WHERE SOURCE_INFO ='POS' AND PROFIT_DATE = #{profitDate} GROUP BY AGENT_ID, PARENT_AGENT_ID,PROFIT_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into TRANS_PROFIT_DETAIL (ID, BUS_NUM, AGENT_ID, AGENT_NAME, PARENT_BUS_NUM, PARENT_AGENT_ID, PROFIT_DATE, IN_TRANS_AMT, OUT_TRANS_AMT, PROFIT_AMT, BUS_CODE, IN_PROFIT_SCALE, OUT_PROFIT_SCALE, IN_PROFIT_AMT, OUT_PROFIT_AMT, POS_CREDIT_AMT, IPOS_CREDIT_AMT, POS_REWARD_AMT, PAY_COMPANY, NOTAX_AMT, SUPPLY_AMT, TRANS_FEE, UNICODE, SOURCE_INFO, AGENT_TYPE, UNLINE_AMT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentBusNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profitDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inTransAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{outTransAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{profitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{busCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inProfitScale,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{outProfitScale,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inProfitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{outProfitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{posCreditAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{iposCreditAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{posRewardAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notaxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{supplyAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unicode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unlineAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
